headline: Regulatory And Political Scrutiny Puts Netflix Warner Bros Deal Under Review
summary: Netflix (NasdaqGS:NFLX) is pursuing a high profile bid to acquire Warner Bros. Discovery, drawing close scrutiny from regulators and politicians. The US Justice Department has opened an antitrust investigation into the proposed transaction. Former President Trump has publicly called for the removal of Netflix board member Susan Rice, raising additional political pressure around the deal. Competing bidders and criticism from prominent entertainment industry figures are adding to the...
